mapper.select:
/* code2.selectListCodeGroup */
SELECT CODECD, CODENM, CODEDESC, DELETEFLAG FROM COM_CODE_V2 WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N' AND PCODECD = '0'

/* code2.selectListCode */
SELECT PCODECD, CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE_V2 WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N' AND PCODECD != '0' ORDER BY PCODECD, CODECD, CODENM
